attributes.action: MPs to respect own constituency in Parliament votes. 401 out of 632 voted Leave.
attributes.additional_details:
Of 632 constituencies 401 voted Leave.
Of 382 voting areas 263 voted Leave.
Of 12 regions 9 voted Leave.

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-36616028

https://ig.ft.com/sites/elections/2016/uk/eu-referendum/

http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/find-information-by-subject/elections-and-referendums/past-elections-and-referendums/eu-referendum/electorate-and-count-information
attributes.background:
MPs MUST respect their constituencies and vote the same way as their electorate in any Parliament vote.

Out of approx 632 constituencies 401 voted Leave.

If this were a general election between Leave and Remain, Leave would have won with a larger majority than the Blair Government in 1997.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual MPs, not of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
